service.method: SELECT GL.VENDOR_CODE , GL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC , DR.CEO_NAME_LOC , GETIRSNO(GL.IRS_NO) AS IRS_NO FROM ICOMVNGL_ICT GL RIGHT OUTER JOIN ICOMADDR_ICT DR ON DR.HOUSE_CODE = GL.HOUSE_CODE AND DR.CODE_NO = GL.VENDOR_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND GL.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND GL.STATUS IN ('C','R') AND GL.JOB_STATUS = 'E' AND DR.CODE_TYPE = '2' AND GL.PURCHASE_BLOCK_FLAG != 'Y' AND GL.VENDOR_CODE LIKE '%' || UPPER( $S{VENDOR_CODE} ) || '%' AND GL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || $S{VENDOR_NAME_LOC} || '%' ORDER BY GL.VENDOR_CODE
